## DatePropertyWidgetComponentBase interface

Base interface for date property widget components.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface DatePropertyWidgetComponentBase extends PropertyWidgetComponentBase
```

**Extends:** [PropertyWidgetComponentBase](./obsidian-typings.propertywidgetcomponentbase.md)
